page.title: 03 AN INTERESTING PERSON
page.content: My uncle,{Peter Noone,}was famous in the 1960's as lead singer in the pop group called Herman's Hermits, and continues to have an interesting life in show business. He started acting when he was ten and studied at {Manchester School of Music.}He auditioned for Granada T.V. and was selected for many parts including Stanley Fairclough, Len Fairclough's son in Coronation Street. At the age of sixteen he was spotted singing in a nightclub and invited to London to make a record which climbed to number one in the Hit Parade. He had many hit songs in Britain and America, where he now lives. He has appeared in This is Your Life and has recently appeared in a production of Pirates of Penzance in London.
